DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study monitor safety profile Trajenta Duo Korean patient type 2 diabetes mellitus ( T2DM ) routine clinical setting .
DOC.brief_title: A Regulatory Requirement Non Interventional Study Monitor Safety Effectiveness Trajenta Duo Type 2 Diabetes Patients Korea
